pr_title: KYLIN-4438 fix bug: null password may cause RuntimeException when starting up

timeline.bodyText: it's better use 'org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils.isBlank' to check blank string case.
timeline.author: zzcclp

replies.bodyText:
Hi, zzcclp:
Thanks for the suggestion. But actually, a blank string can be encrypted and its cypher text is not a blank string.
e.g. result of EncryptUtil.encrypt("") is "719bTBvphWewRiCiCj3D/A=="
So only null check is needed, I think.
replies.author: xiacongling

replies.bodyText: Got it. Thanks for your explanation.
replies.author: zzcclp

timeline.message: KYLIN-4438 fix bug: null password may cause RuntimeException when starting up
